name: Torn City Dark
description:
Hi there, this is my first (probably half-baked, to some extent) attempt at making a Stylish script. It's for Torn City, a text-based browser game found at www.torncity.com.

  I hope you like it, maybe if I get a bit better at this I'll make it look better :)

EDIT: A bit improved today but still not great. I'll work on it soon, hopefully.
